articles.description: Oscar-winning singer Maureen McGovern announced that she has been diagnosed with a rare variant of Alzheimer's disease in a new Facebook video on Friday.
articles.content:

articles.title: WWE has decided on a name for Bayley's stable - Wrestling News
articles.description:
On Tuesday, August 17, WWE filed for the trademark for "DAMAGE CTRL." This appears to be the name for Bayley's new stable with Dakota Kai and IYO SKY.
